Name: Biblos Bar
Review Text:
They really go an extra mile during the Halloween on deco and ambiance. Drinks fairly priced and friendly staff. Clean.
No a place to "sit".

Name: Biblos Bar
Review Text: Small bar with a lot of character. Played a lot of hit songs from America, I'm sure the karaoke night they host on Monday nights would be a great time with some friends! Just came here for drinks, bartenders had a lot of humorous personalities

Name: Biblos Bar
Review Text: Really cool place to visit. The bartenders are very friendly and nice. Good choice of music, it was not too crowd for that moment, but still nice .Highly  Recomending!

Name: Biblos Bar
Review Text: It's a super fun place to hang.  The night I was there they had a very fun karaoke night going on

Name: Biblos Bar
Review Text: We thoroughly enjoyed our time at Biblis. Great people, cold beer and plenty of screens.  Bedankt!

Name: Biblos Bar
Review Text: For me it was the best bar experience in Amsterdam. The bar closes 3am (2hour after all bars in red district are closed) and you are served by the most friendly bar staff I could meet in Amsterdam. I love it and I recommend it 100%!!!

Name: Biblos Bar
Review Text: Fun traditional brown bar. Later during the night there will be people dancing. Good shots, very nice staff and good prices.

Name: Biblos Bar
Review Text: Lovely pub ,near to our hostel!!An excellent variety of beers and good music
